info.title: McApi
info.description: Here lies the definitions for all the routes that are available in the McAPI backend.

post.description: Registers a user with the given userType!
post.summary: Register a user with the given paramaters

requestBody.description: user to add to the system.

200.description: The ID of the created user.

id.description: The ID of the created User.

404.description: Either School or district was not found.

patch.summary: Activate a user with the given paramaters

Password-activation.summary: Activation of a user with a password example

200.description: Success Message.

patch.summary: Authenticate a user with the given username and password

Authenticate.summary: Authentication of a user with a password example

200.description: Success Message.

message.description: Message of the response from the server, if not authenticated this provides an explanation as to why..

authenticated.description: If the user was authenticated or not.

accessToken.description: JWT token created by the backend that stores the users permissions. Used to authenticate requests.

userID.description: The ID of the user that was authenticated.

success.summary: An example of a Success Response

incorrect-password.summary: An example of an incorrect password Response

non-active-account.summary: An example of a Response for authenticating a non-active user.

value.message: This account is not yet activated!

patch.description: Update the password for a user!
patch.summary: Update the password for a user with the given username

Password-update.summary: update a user with a password example

200.description: Success Message.

success.summary: An example of a Success Response for updating a users password

value.message: Please provide a username and/or password

get.description: Get a user with the given User ID!
get.summary: Get a user with the given ID from the query paramaters

200.description: Success response

patch.summary: archive/restore a user with the given paramaters

200.description: Success response.

patch.summary: Delete a user with the given paramaters

200.description: Success Message.

get.summary: Get all the districts in the database, only return the id and name

200.description: An array of all the districts

post.summary: Create a district with the given name, state, and type

state.description: The state of where the district resides

200.description: The created district.

get.summary: Get a district from the database

200.description: All of the information for a district

get.description: Get all the schools in a district
get.summary: Get all the schools and associated information for a district

200.description: All of the information for a district

patch.summary: Update a district with the given ID

200.description: All of the information for a district

delete.description: Delete a district with the given ID

200.description: A success message for deleting a district

patch.summary: archive/restore a District with the given paramaters

200.description: Success Message.

patch.description: Add a sales admin to a district!
patch.summary: adds the district to the sales admin and allows a district to query that admin

200.description: Success Message.

message.description: Sales Admin Successfully added to district.

patch.description: Remove a sales admin to a district!
patch.summary: Removes the district from the sales admin, district no longer has access to this user

200.description: Success Message.

message.description: Sales Admin Successfully removed to district.

post.summary: Create a school with the given name, state, type and district

state.description: The state of where the school resides

district.description: The ID of the district the school belongs to

200.description: The created School.

get.summary: Get a school from the database

200.description: All of the information for a school

get.description: Get all the teachers in a School
get.summary: Get all the teachers in a School

200.description: All of the information for a schools teachers

username.description: The usernames of the teachers at this school

get.description: Get all the students in a School
get.summary: Get all the students in a School

200.description: All of the information for a schools students

username.description: The usernames of the students at this school

patch.summary: Update a school with the given ID

200.description: All of the information for a school

delete.description: Delete a school with the given ID

200.description: A success message for deleting a school.

patch.summary: archive/restore a School with the given paramaters

200.description: Success Message.

patch.description: Add or Update a license on a school for a given course
patch.summary: If school already has a license with this course, the licenses will be updated, else a new license will be created.

200.description: Success message for the adding or updating a course license to a school

patch.description: Remove a license on a school for a given course
patch.summary: Removes a course license from a school

200.description: Success message for removing a course license from a school.

patch.description: Archive a license on a school for a given course
patch.summary: Archive a course license from a school

200.description: Success message for archiving a course license from a school.

message.description: A message that describes the error

MCAdmin.description: A representation of a MC_ADMIN. Note that `MCAdmin` will be used as the discriminator value.

Sales.description: A representation of a SALES. Note that `Sales` will be used as the discriminator value.

districts.description: The district that this user is a part of

DistrictAdmin.description: A representation of a DISTRICT_ADMIN. Note that `DistrictAdmin` will be used as the discriminator value.

SchoolAdmin.description: A representation of a SCHOOL_ADMIN. Note that `SchoolAdmin` will be used as the discriminator value.

Teacher.description: A representation of a TEACHER. Note that `Teacher` will be used as the discriminator value.

items.description: The classrooms that this teacher is in.

Student.description: A representation of a STUDENT. Note that `Student` will be used as the discriminator value.

items.description: The classrooms that this student is enrolled in, along with metadata.

addedBy.description: The first and lastname or the username of the user that added the student into the classroom

createdBy.description: The first and lastname or the username of the user that added the student into the classroom

state.description: The state of where the district resides

createdBy.description: The username of the user that created the district. Not a reference in case the user is deleted.

schools.description: A list of all the schools within this district.

classrooms.description: A list of all the classrooms within this district.

admins.description: A list of all the district admins within this district.

sales.description: A list of all the sales admins within this district.

schoolAdmins.description: A list of all the school admins within this district.

teachers.description: A list of all the teachers within this district.

students.description: A list of all the students within this district.

state.description: The state of where the school resides

licenses.description: The Course licenses provided to the school.

course.description: The tag for the course that this license is for

displayName.description: A custom display name for the course if given

activation.description: The date of activation for the license if given

expiration.description: The date of expiration for the license if given

isDemoLicense.description: If the license is a demo license

archived.description: If this license has been archived.

createdBy.description: The username of the user that created the school. Not a reference in case the user is deleted.

classrooms.description: A list of all the classrooms within this district.

schoolAdmins.description: A list of all the school admins within this school.

teachers.description: A list of all the teachers within this district.

students.description: A list of all the students within this district.

courseInfo.description: The course metadata for this classroom

displayName.description: The custom display name for this course as defined on the license for that school.

course.description: Virtual course field that is populated on request. the entire Course is not stored on the classroom. Referenced from code

name.description: The name of the school, metadata in-case the school is deleted
The name of the district, metadata in-case the district is deleted

items.description: The Teachers that are assigned to this classroom, with associated metadata.

username.description: The username of the teacher, metadata in-case the teacher is deleted

addedBy.description: The username or name of the user that added this teacher to the classroom.

items.description: The students that are enrolled in this classroom, and associated metadata.

username.description: The username of the student, metadata in-case the student is deleted

quiz.description: A reference to the quiz section for this course.

title.description: The title of the quiz that was taken

latest.description: The most recent quiz submission from this student

isCorrect.description: If the students given answer is correct or not.

score.description: The overall score for this attempt for this student

attempt.description: The attempt number for this quiz by this student.

attemptDate.description: The date that the attempt was made.

previous.description: A list of all the previous attempts a student has made.

isCorrect.description: If the students given answer is correct or not.

score.description: The overall score for this attempt for this student

attempt.description: The attempt number for this quiz by this student.

attemptDate.description: The date that the attempt was made.

resetDate.description: The date at which this quiz attempt was reset.

resetBy.description: The username of the user who reset the quiz attempt for the student.

addedBy.description: The username or name of the user that added this student to the classroom.

archived.description: If this classroom has been archived.

createdBy.description: The username or name of the user that created this classroom

isDemoSection.description: If this section is available on a demo license

duration.description: The estimated length of time needed to complete this section

difficulty.description: The estimated difficulty for this section

files.description: Any Files that have been uploaded for this section

resources.description: A list of resources that have been created for this section

markdown.description: The markdown created for this resource

index.description: The indexed order of the resource

forStudent.description: If this resource is for a Student

forTeacher.description: If this resource is for a Teacher

isPublished.description: Wether this section is a draft or published version of a section

published.description: If this is a draft section and it has been published atleast once, this holds the reference to the published version of the section

draft.description: If this is a published section, this holds the reference to the draft version of the section

Quiz.description: A representation of a QUIZ. Note that `Quiz` will be used as the discriminator value.

type.description: The type of question, mainly multiple choice but allows for modularity with different question types.

explanation.description: An explanation of the answer for this question

tags.description: The tags for this question. To be used for filtering specific questions from all courses.

choices.description: The different answer choices for this question.

isCorrect.description: If this choice is the correct answer.

Video.description: A representation of a VIDEO. Note that `Video` will be used as the discriminator value.

videoURL.description: The url for the video that was created for this section

markdown.description: The markdown created for this section

Document.description: A representation of a DOCUMENT. Note that `Document` will be used as the discriminator value.

markdown.description: The markdown created for this section

Project.description: A representation of a PROJECT. Note that `Project` will be used as the discriminator value.

markdown.description: The markdown created for this section

url.description: The URL of where the file is hosted.

key.description: The AWS Bucket key for the object

versionId.description: The version ID of the file in AWS

uploadedBy.description: The username of the user that uploaded this file

code.description: The course code that will be used to identify this course, COURSE CODES MUST BE UNIQUE

duration.description: The total duration of this course, added up from all the sections

skills.description: The skills that are covered in this course.

draft.description: The draft version of the course.

units.description: The draft units on this course

published.description: The published version of the course.

units.description: The published units on this course

publishedBy.description: The username of the user that published this course.

index.description: The index order of this unit

chapters.description: The array of chapters on this unit.

index.description: The index order of this chapter

sections.description: Metadata array to handle the sections for this chapter

index.description: The index order of this section, this is only stored on the course, not on the individual sections.

_s.description: The reference to the actual section

value.message: You must provide a valid userType.
You must provide a valid username.
You must provide a valid email.
Please only provide either google or clever OAuth, not both.
Must provide a name and state!
Must provide a valid school ID!
Sales Admin Successfully added to district.
Sales Admin Successfully removed from district.
